type.name: org.gradle.process.BaseExecSpec
type.description: Specifies options for launching a child process.

method.name: getCommandLine
method.description:
Returns the full command line, including the executable plus its arguments.

returns:The full command line, including the executable plus its arguments

method.name: getErrorOutput
method.description:
Returns the output stream to consume standard error from the process executing the command. Default to System.err.

returns:The error output stream.

method.name: getStandardInput
method.description:
Returns the standard input stream for the process executing the command. The stream is closed after the process completes. Defaults to an empty stream.

returns:The standard input stream.

method.name: getStandardOutput
method.description:
Returns the output stream to consume standard output from the process executing the command. Defaults to System.out.

returns:The output stream

method.name: isIgnoreExitValue
method.description:
Tells whether a non-zero exit value is ignored, or an exception thrown. Defaults to false.

returns:whether a non-zero exit value is ignored, or an exception thrown

method.name: setErrorOutput
method.description:
Sets the output stream to consume standard error from the process executing the command. The stream is closed after the process completes.
param:outputStream The standard output error stream for the process. Must not be null.

returns:this

method.name: setIgnoreExitValue
method.description:
Sets whether a non-zero exit value is ignored, or an exception thrown.
param:ignoreExitValue whether a non-zero exit value is ignored, or an exception thrown

returns:this

method.name: setStandardInput
method.description:
Sets the standard input stream for the process executing the command. The stream is closed after the process completes.
param:inputStream The standard input stream for the process. Must not be null.

returns:this

method.name: setStandardOutput
method.description:
Sets the output stream to consume standard output from the process executing the command. The stream is closed after the process completes.
param:outputStream The standard output stream for the process. Must not be null.

returns:this

property.name: commandLine
property.description:
Returns the full command line, including the executable plus its arguments.

returns:The full command line, including the executable plus its arguments

property.name: errorOutput
property.description:
Returns the output stream to consume standard error from the process executing the command. Default to System.err.

returns:The error output stream.

property.name: ignoreExitValue
property.description:
Tells whether a non-zero exit value is ignored, or an exception thrown. Defaults to false.

returns:whether a non-zero exit value is ignored, or an exception thrown

property.name: standardInput
property.description:
Returns the standard input stream for the process executing the command. The stream is closed after the process completes. Defaults to an empty stream.

returns:The standard input stream.

property.name: standardOutput
property.description:
Returns the output stream to consume standard output from the process executing the command. Defaults to System.out.

returns:The output stream
